Literature.Title: Characterization of Cimex lectularius (bedbug) defensin peptide and its antimicrobial activity against human skin microflora.
Literature.Author: Kaushal A, Gupta K, van Hoek ML

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Corynebacterium renale ATCC 19412(MIC=41.66µg/ml),Micrococcus luteus ATCC 4698(MIC=2.60µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(no activity data),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 14990(MIC=41.66µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 9955(no activity data),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(no activity data),Corynebacterium renale ATCC 19412(EC50=2.26µg/ml),Micrococcus luteus ATCC 4698(EC50=7.21µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(EC50=2.17µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 14990(EC50=2.45µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 9955(EC50=>100µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(EC50=>100µg/ml)
